p:
To a stirred solution of 3-(prop-2-inyloxy)-13α-estra-1,3,5(10)-trien-17-one 7 (616 mg, 2.0 mmol) in toluene (8 ml), Ph 3P (52 mg, 0.2 mmol), CuI (19.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), DIPEA (1.04 ml, 6.0 mmol), and benzylazide or 4- tert-butyl-benzylazide (1 equiv.
16 ) were added. The reaction mixtures were refluxed for 2 h, cooled to rt and evaporated in vacuo. The residues were purified by flash chromatography with EtOAc/CH 2Cl 2 = 5/95 as eluent. Compound 4a was obtained as a white solid (862 mg, 97%), mp 164‒165 °C, R f = 0.35 (ss C); 1H NMR: δ ppm 1.05 (s, 3H, H-18); 2.80 (m, 2H, H-6); 5.14 (s, 2H, OCH 2); 5.51 (s, 2H, NCH 2); 6.67 (s, 1H, H-4); 6.75 (dd, J = 8.5 Hz, J = 2.0 Hz, 1H, H-2); 7.16 (d, J = 8.5 Hz, 1H, H-1); 7.27 (m, 2H, H-2′, H-6′); 7.36 (m, 3H, H-3′, H-4′, H-5′); 7.50 (s, 1H, C = CH). Compound 4a is identical with the compound described in Ref. [ 16].
